Dialogue: You...You fell from the sky!~How is that possible?~Am I dreaming?
You are hurt, but no one can help you this far from the tower...~Tower, do you understand?~Go to the tower!
Full Clue: I debluao, tap gi chiwech ikuuw mashsas

Dialogue: Someone in the village must be able to heal you with their magic~Head in the tower's direction.~You'll reach the village~...hopefully.
Full Clue: nudebe tapech liichaade gi kaatoch ko mashsuasi

Dialogue: I heard the tower has magic that can do anything...~I've never been that close before, but if the stories are true...
Full Clue: piiwime aheepimu ko mashsuasi ikaw mashsas

Dialogue: Do you know the story about the man in the tower?~A bard told me about it a long time ago.~I can barely remember the detail...
